profileAlternative.name: Viola Cao
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist (Machine/Deep Learning & AI)
profileAlternative.summary:
A visionary Data Scientist at Zurich North America, graduated from NYU Data Science Master's program, with a focus on Deep/Machine learning (Computer Vision, NLP, Reinforcement Learning, etc.) and Big Data Practice in new technology, media, medical and financial industry.

Working at United Nations Headquarters, energy industry and banking system, I have been intensively involved in Deep Neural Network based applications such as Recommendation Engine, Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Database Management, with Python (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Sklearn), SQL, Spark and Hadoop, as well as massive exposures to corporate financial modeling tools.

My academic background is in Data Science and Finance. Having studied in America, England, and China, I have built a global vision, a strong passion for new technology, and a prospect for international development.
